channel.title: Whats this error telling me?
channel.description: [code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:843: error: bad operand types for binary operator '&&' if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && c.playerRights = 2) { ^ first type: boolean second type: int Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Whats this error telling me?
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:2, topic:454326”]= is an assignment operator == is of equality.
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/operators.html

Since you’re trying to say playerRights should be equal to 2 it should be c.playerRights == 2[/quote]

It is, it’s below on the next line.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats this error telling me?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

= is an assignment operator == is of equality.
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/operators.html

Since you’re trying to say playerRights should be equal to 2 it should be c.playerRights == 2

Read full topic
